pullRequest.title: Enable CRAMs in RevertSamSpark
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fix #5559.
Adds companion cram/bam for most of the existing tests.

nodes.bodyText: This is fine, but should we also add some tests with "non-basic" / less trivial bams and crams? Also, we might want to have an explicit test for a cram with an embedded reference.
Update the tool docs to mention that it will also take cram files.

It might be useful to include in this array of test various output types, like cram and bam. Take this one with a grain of salt as I'm not sure its necessarily the job of THIS tool to test writing functionality for cram.
